original_title: 本当にあった怨霊恐怖動画6
overview: The sixth horror documentary released by the staff of the "Real Vengeful Ghost Horror Video" series. Includes all 10 posted videos that director Junpei Tsuchida has lifted the ban on to death. Here is the most terrifying message from an evil spirit who left this world with a strong grudge, caught by chance in everyday images.
title: Real Vengeful Ghost Horror Video 6
